comment_sdk_config: This is the configuration file for the React SDK Components
sdk_optional_configs_doc_comment: See the document(link below) for more details on all the available config settings

authConfig.mashupClient_comment: Client ID and Client secret from the OAuth 2.0 Client Registration record used for mashup use case
authConfig.mashupClient_comment2: See SDK Guide for instructions on how to generate and obtain the proper values for the following entries
authConfig.portalClientId_comment: Client ID from the OAuth 2.0 Client Registration record used for portal use case

serverConfig.infinityRestServerUrl_comment: Full path to Infinity REST server
serverConfig.appAlias_comment: appAlias of the application which operators will be accessing (e.g., MediaCo)
serverConfig.sdkContentServerUrl_comment: If specified, the given URL will be used. If left blank, window.location.origin will be used.
serverConfig.appPortal_comment: If specified, the given appPortal will be loaded. If left blank, the operator's default Portal is used. Ignored for Embedded use
serverConfig.appMashupCaseType_comment: If specified, uses this case type for mashup.  Otherwise, uses the first case type found for the app
serverConfig.excludePortals_comment: Array of specific portals to avoid attempting to load with SDK
